This game is only interesting for the killers and the builds beside that Behavior is garbage when it comes to balancing the game, and as of now they are running a halloween event and selling skins but console players get stuck in loading screens for years. its not killer vs survivor it killer gets bullied by survivors, maps are so big running anything but gen defense will get you rolled really fast against a team, and its like playing russian roulette on maps hoping you dont get one with easy loops, then killer sided maps are also unfair because theres nothing survivors can do without dead hard. It acts like its suppose to be a competitive game but the only thing they can make fair and balanced is the shop. Also to get actual perks you want takes forever even when doing the challenges only started playing it because I wanna make interesting builds, but survivors have way more build potential.
Esse jogo é bom porem mal aproveitado, precisa de mais otimização, ser menos surv sided HAHA XD

It impresses me that there is just not another game you can easily compare DBD to as it is in a very unique genre by itself, just calling it horror does not feel like it does it any justice. I don't enjoy horror games but after getting over the initial shock of killers, this game is something I can't stop going back to as it's fulfilling a gaming experience I can't find anywhere else.

Really enjoy the game, but wish it was a bit more balanced. It's definitely a lot harder for the survivors than it is the killer. Still an overall enjoyable game and I almost always have fun playing :)

This game is ridiculously fun, especially if you play as the killer because you get to play some of your favorite horror film characters I highly recommend

Эта игра просто нечто!
Я прошел обучалку (как по мне не о чем - очень просто), получил игровые очки и ринулся выживать.
Потом я узнал, что вероятность самому соскочить с крюка составляет аж 4% :) и еще много чего в таком духе...
    Чисто мои выводы:
    -За маньяков играть проще. В том смысле, что если кто-то смог сбежать, то это небольшое огорчение, так досада :)
    -А вот за выживших, когда ты по три раза попадаешь на крюк... и несколько каток подряд... и самый первый палишься под мелодию песенки "Придет серенький волчок ..." и это только начало страданий...

     Мне зашло. Почти двое суток не вылазил из игры.

     P.S. Тут многие пишут про сообщество, типа унылей чем в Dota. Это не так. Совсем

Game is a mess. Spaghetti code creates an infinite number of bugs and glitches with each new patch. Its fun if you want to get a laugh and dick around with your friends (not taking ANYTHING seriously) but other than that, don't buy.

DBD, un juego 4v1 donde la mayoría de los sobrevivientes son equipos comunicados con muchas perks para sobrevivir pero aún asi juran por sus madres que el rol de Asesino tiene mucha mas ventaja.

Es divertido por los skins, por las misiones, por los personajes y colaboraciones que tiene con otras marcas y personajes de películas conocidas.

I don't play many multiplayer games, but this one caught my attention.
Pros:
1. If you prefer to play alone, Killer is great and solo survivor works most of the time.
2. Literally got 1.6M free BP when I downloaded from codes and promos lol.
3. I never know what to expect going into a game, will the killer/survivors be nice or am I actually going to play a round? Element of surprise keeps me coming back.
4. The collabs and deals they have done with franchises?? Amazing. Being able to play as Pyramid Head is so cool, and I get to see Silent Hill and Resident Evil characters in new environments. Plus the slasher classics.
5. Pretty free in choosing how to build a character, although there is a downside to that, which I mention in the Cons.

Cons:
1. Very grindy, if that's not something you enjoy, I wouldn't pick this game up.
2. Can be toxic sometimes, I mostly see it from survivors, but then again I usually play killer.
3. High skill ceiling, lots of perk options for killers and survivors, choosing wrong or "off-meta" perks usually results in a bad game experience.
4. Tons of DLC, which when not on sale is kinda pricey.
5. The whole NFT situation, which I don't really understand but lots are upset about.
6. Insane wait times on loading screens, and about 1 in 10 matches I sit on a match loading screen for 3 minutes, after waiting 7 minutes to find a match, then the match ends instantly and no one gets any BP or rank ups.

Overall, this has been my favorite game as of late. Sure it has problems, but so far I have been able to look past those because of the genuinely fun experience I have playing the game and getting good at my preferred killer. I hope this games fixes the issues me and others are facing, and that I'm not just in a honeymoon phase right now.

Good Luck to all survivors and my fellow killers:)
